text: The Philips Odyssey series is a series of home video game consoles. They were marketed by Philips. The Philips Odyssey series is the successor to the Magnavox Odyssey series. == History == Magnavox made video game consoles. But in 1974, Magnavox became a subsidiary of Philips. Philips continued making consoles. These consoles are known as the Philips Odyssey series. == Consoles == The following is a list of all consoles released in the Philips Odyssey series: * Philips Odyssey 200 (1976) * Philips Odyssey 2001 (1977) * Philips Odyssey 2100 (1978) * Philips Videopac G7000 (1978) Category:Video game consoles
title: Philips Odyssey series
